001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.classinfo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonPropertyOrder;
006
007import java.net.URL;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009import java.nio.file.Paths;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import java.util.Optional;
012import java.util.jar.JarFile;
013
014import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.json.JacksonUtils.dumpAsJson;
015
016@JsonPropertyOrder(alphabetic = true)
017@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_EMPTY)
018public record ClassInfo(
019    @JsonIgnore Class<?> clazz
020) {
021    public ClassInfo {
022        Objects.requireNonNull(clazz);
023    }
024    Module module() {
025        return clazz.getModule();
026    }
027    Optional<ClassLoader> classLoader() {
028        return Optional.ofNullable(clazz.getClassLoader());
029    }
030
031
032    public String getClassName() {
033        return clazz.getName();
034    }
035    public String getSimpleName() {
036        return clazz.getSimpleName();
037    }
038    public URL getClassLocation() {
039        return clazz.getResource(getSimpleName() + ".class");
040    }
041    public String getClassLoaderName() {
042        return classLoader().map(ClassLoader::getName).orElse("<< bootstrap >>");
043    }
044    public String getModuleName() {
045        return module().isNamed() ? module().getName() : "<< ALL-UNNAMED >>";
046    }
047
048
049    public JarFileInfo getJarFileInfo() {
050        try {
051            URL classLocation = clazz.getProtectionDomain().getCodeSource().getLocation();
052            Path jarPath = Paths.get(classLocation.toURI());
053            return new JarFileInfo(new JarFile(jarPath.toFile()));
054        } catch (Exception ex) {
055            return null;
056        }
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public String toString() {
061        return dumpAsJson(this);
062    }
063}
